column1: I wish we'd never left this beautiful spot. Wendy's house was spectacular
column2: we loved every minute there. We were a group of 12 people including an infant
column3: and there was plenty of space for all of us. The views from the terrace were beautiful
column4: short walk to the beach and the house was equipped with everything we could possibly need. Wendy was so responsive and gracious
column5: we felt so spoiled. Thank you for everything Wendy
column6: we hope to come back one day!
